summary: In the late nineteenth century, an Ancient Egyptian sorcerer discovers the art of transferring the souls of the dead into inanimate objects.
cast: Greg Sestero|Brigitta Dau|Stephen Blackehart|Jack Donner|Guy Rolfe|Robert Radoveanu|Vitalie Bantas|Sando Teodor|George Calin|Giuliano Doman|Vlad Dulea|Dan Fintescu|Serban Celea|Elvira Deatcu|Claudiu Trandafir|Marcel Cobzariu|Viorel Manole|Mihai Verbintschi|Adrian Ciobanu|Razvan Popa|Aurelian Popa|Cristian Irimia|Ion Bechet|John R. Ellis
title: Retro Puppet Master
